title: 140 Flirty Jokes & Pick-Up Lines to Make Her Laugh

steps.title: Crank up the heat with a fun and flirty message.
steps.content: Crank up the heat with a fun and flirty message. According to dating and relationship coach Julianne Cantarella, “women always find humor attractive.” Being playful is one of the best ways to flirt with a girl and catch her attention, so use any of the following jokes and one-liners to express interest in someone: 4+4=8 but you+me=fate I want to A, B, C, you later. Wanna be Minecraft without the craft? If you were a taser, you’d be set to stun. When God made you, he was showing off. You looked really sexy in my dreams last night. If you were a vegetable, you’d be a cute-cumber. The doctor says I’m seriously lacking in Vitamin U. Do you like raisins? How do you feel about a date? Okay, I texted you. What are your other two wishes? When can I see you again? Pick a day that ends in “y.” Do you like Star Wars ? Because Yoda only one for me! If you were a song, you’d be the hottest single on Spotify. Aside from being sexy, what do you do in your spare time? If you were Christmas, then I’d be the Grinch who stole you. If I can rearrange the alphabet, I would put U and I together. On a scale of 1 to America, how free are you this weekend? I hope you know CPR because you’re taking my breath away. You must be really tired from running through my mind all day. If being beautiful was a crime, you’d be serving a life sentence. You’re pretty, and I think I’m cute. Together, we’d be pretty cute. I should charge you rent for spending so much time in my head. You better direct that beauty somewhere else, or I’ll lose my mind. Somebody call the cops because it should be illegal to look that good! Let’s commit the perfect crime. I’ll steal your heart, and you’ll steal mine. I’m convinced you’re made of copper and tellurium. Because you’re Cu-Te. When I send your pic to the group chat, which one do you want me to use? I’d say you’re out of this world, but then how would we grab tacos together? Can I follow you on Instagram? My mom always told me to follow my dreams. I’d like to take you to the movies, but they don’t let you bring in your own snacks. I believe that honesty is the best policy, so to be perfectly honest, you’re the sexiest woman I’ve ever seen.

steps.title: Drop a witty line to get a girl’s attention (and possibly her number)!
steps.content: Drop a witty line to get a girl’s attention (and possibly her number)! Feeling extra bold? Pull out a fun and flirty line that leaves little room for interpretation! These pick-up lines are perfect if you’ve just met a girl at a bar or restaurant, or matched with her on a dating app: Are you French? Because Eiffel for you. Do you like science? Because I got my ion you. Did the sun come out or did you just smile at me? Are you German? Because I’d like to be Ger-man. Are you a keyboard? Because you’re just my type. Are you a charger? Because I’m dying without you. Was your dad a boxer? Because you’re a knockout! Are you a fruit? Because you look like a FINE-apple! Is your name Wi-Fi? Because I’m feeling a connection. Do you like Nintendo? Because Wii look good together. Are you a cannon? Because you’ve just blown me away. Are you a time traveler? Because I see you in my future! Do you have a map? Because I just got lost in your eyes. Hey, my name’s Microsoft. Can I crash at your place tonight? Do I know you? Because you look a lot like my next girlfriend. Is your license suspended? Because you’re driving me crazy! Do you believe in love at first sight, or should I walk by again? Are you religious? Because you’re the answer to all my prayers. Are you my laptop? Because you’re really hot and I’m concerned. Are you a supernova? Because you’re out-of-this-world attractive! Is your name John? Because I’ve never Cena prettier girl than you. Are you a Mariah Carey song? Because all I want for Christmas is you. If I had to write a report card on you, I’d give you straight F’s…for Fineee. Are you my student loans? Because I want you around for the rest of my life. Aren’t you worried about global warming? Because you’re making it hot in here. Did you have lucky charms for breakfast? Because you look magically delicious! You must be an overdue library book…because you have “fine” written all over you. Are you my appendix? Because I have this feeling in my stomach like I want to take you out.

steps.title: Break the ice with a cute and creative pick-up line.
steps.content: Break the ice with a cute and creative pick-up line. If you want to stand out from the crowd and make a great first impression, use any of these clever pick-up lines. They’ll lighten the mood, show off your sense of humor, and impress your potential date : Your hand looks heavy. Can I hold it for you? Do you have a name, or can I call you mine? I lost my phone number. Can I borrow yours? So…What time do you have to be back in heaven? Do you play soccer? Because you look like a keeper. Are you Netflix? Because I could watch you for hours. Can I borrow a kiss from you? I promise I’ll give it back. They say dating is a numbers game, so can I get yours? People call me (your name), but you can call me tonight. What’s it like to be the most gorgeous person in the room? Is your birthday on October 10th? Because you’re a 10/10. I see you like vodka. Does that mean you’ll give me a shot? Let’s flip a coin. Heads, and I’m yours. Tails, and you’re mine. Can I take your picture to prove to my friends that angels exist? Didn’t we have a class together? I could’ve sworn we had chemistry! I’m learning about important dates in history. Want to be one of them? Have you been to the doctor lately? I think you’re lacking in vitamin me. When I text you good morning tomorrow, what number should I send it to? You must be related to Google because you’re everything I’m searching for. I thought happiness started with an “h,” but I guess it actually starts with “u.” I have a phone number, you have a phone number…Think of all the possibilities. There must be something wrong with my eyes because I can’t take them off you. What’s your favorite drink? I’m asking so I know what to buy you when we go on our first date. You’re stupidly gorgeous, but I can tell that’s the least interesting thing about you. I’d love to learn more. I’ve memorized the first 300 digits of pi. If you gave me the 10 digits of your phone number, I bet I could memorize that too. Excuse me, do you know what time is it? Thanks! I just want to remember the exact moment I met the woman of my dreams. My buddies bet me that I wouldn’t be able to start a conversation with the prettiest girl in the bar. Want to buy some drinks with their money?

steps.title: Highlight what you love about her or your relationship.
steps.content: Highlight what you love about her or your relationship. If you’ve been dating for a while, feel free to send a more romantic message. Expressing your feelings is the key to building intimacy and desire with your girlfriend. [1] X Research source So, mention her best qualities, how lucky you feel to be dating her, or how boring life would be without her! Your smile could disarm a bomb. Guess what’s on the menu? Me-n-u! You don’t need keys to drive me crazy. When I’m with you, it feels like heaven. When it comes to love, I’ve hit the jackpot. I only miss you on the days that end with “y.” If you want to make me smile, give me a call. Your eyes are like Ikea. I’m totally lost in them. I can’t believe I’m dating the girl of my dreams. If nothing lasts forever, will you be my nothing? If you were a flower, you’d be a damnnn-delion. Returning home to you is the highlight of my day. Life without you is like a broken pencil…pointless. If I was a cat, I’d spend all of my nine lives with you. Call me Shrek because I’m head ogre heels for you. I know no one’s perfect, but you’re pretty darn close. If smiles were currency, you’d make me a millionaire. I’m not a hoarder, but I really want to keep you forever. When I’m with you, I’m not sure if I’m awake or dreaming. There isn’t a word in the dictionary for how amazing you look. You want to know what’s beautiful? Read that first word again. If I could only take one thing to a desert island, it would be you. I’m sorry I didn’t reply sooner. I was too busy thinking about you. I tried writing a joke about us, but I couldn’t find a punchline as cute as you. There’s only one thing I want to change about you, and that’s your last name. I’m not a mechanic, but I think my heart needs a tune-up every time I see you. If I had a star for every time you brightened my day, I’d have a galaxy in my hand. They say Disneyland is the happiest place on earth. Well apparently, no one has ever been standing next to you.

steps.title: Whip out a knock-knock joke to win her over.
steps.content: Whip out a knock-knock joke to win her over. Some knock-knock jokes have a reputation for being corny and cliché, but the following lines are the perfect blend of cheesy and charming. Starting off with a knock-knock joke is the perfect way to show off your personality, spice up a text conversation , or leave a memorable first impression. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Anita. Anita who? Anita kiss from you! Knock-knock. Who’s there? Owl. Owl who? Owl see you real soon. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Aldo. Aldo who? Aldo anything for you! Knock-knock. Who’s there? Canoe. Canoe who? Canoe give me a kiss? Knock-knock. Who’s there? Iguana. Iguana who? Iguana hold your hand. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Police. Police who? Police come over tonight. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Oman. Oman who? Oman, you sure are cute! Knock-knock. Who’s there? Zoo. Zoo who? Zoo want to go out sometime? Knock-knock. Who’s there? Ben. Ben who? Ben thinking about you all day. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Juno. Juno who? Juno I think you’re cute, right? Knock-knock. Who’s there? A loan. A loan who? I can’t wait to get you a loan. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Hugh. Hugh who? Hugh have an incredible smile. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Water. Water who? Water you doing later tonight? Knock-knock. Who’s there? Pauline. Pauline who? I’m Pauline in love with you. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Ivana. Ivana who? Ivana take you out this weekend. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Baby Yoda. Baby Yoda who? Baby Yoda one for me! Knock-knock. Who’s there? Gopher. Gopher who? Gopher me, not some other guy. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Wire. Wire who? Wire you still standing there? Kiss me! Knock-knock. Who’s there? Russian. Russian who? I’m Russian to get your number. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Snow. Snow who? Snow use, I can’t stop thinking about you! Knock-knock. Who’s there? Wendy. Wendy who? Wendy you want to go on a date with me? Knock-knock. Who’s there? Sherwood. Sherwood who? I Sherwood like to go out with you. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Noah. Noah who? Noah place we could go out sometime? Knock-knock. Who’s there? Where, when. Where, when, who? My place, tonight, me and you. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Norma Lee. Norma Lee who? Norma Lee I don’t talk to strangers, but you caught my attention. Knock-knock. Who’s there? Eye. Eye who. Eye think you’re the most gorgeous person I’ve ever seen.

steps.title: Wait for the perfect time to drop your line.
steps.content: Wait for the perfect time to drop your line. Timing is everything when it comes to delivering flirty jokes, so feel the flow of the conversation before making your move. Opening with a joke is a great strategy to secure a date (if you’re not friends with the other person), but if you’re trying to take your friendship to the next level , you might want to ease into a flirty conversation.

steps.title: Use puns, wordplay, and silly questions to show off your sense of humor.
steps.content: Use puns, wordplay, and silly questions to show off your sense of humor. When you’re starting out, it’s great to have a bunch of flirty jokes on hand, but incorporating details from your conversation, the environment, and/or the other person’s interests and personality can make your joke hit harder. Drop a witty pick-up line to show interest in the other person, or give a genuine compliment —the more specific, the better! Reader Poll: We asked 158 wikiHow readers if they think humor is effective for starting a conversation with a girl, and 81% of them said yes. [Take Poll]

steps.title: Make sure she’s interested in you to avoid coming off as creepy.
steps.content: Make sure she’s interested in you to avoid coming off as creepy. In general, a girl will appreciate a flirty joke if she’s into you, but feel uncomfortable if she doesn't like you. Before shooting your shot, think of how she acts when she’s around you. Some signs that she might like you include: having open body language, making eye contact, trying to touch you, mirroring your movements, fidgeting around you, or giving you compliments. [2] X Research source If your joke falls flat, don’t try to explain it to her. Instead, make a joke about the joke! Tell her it was terrible but that she was making you nervous. Dating coach and matchmaker Laura Bilotta says, “one of the best ways to put someone at ease and build a connection is to be willing to laugh at yourself.” If she reacts positively, ask her open-ended questions to keep the conversation going. Then, move it into a more flirtatious zone to show her you’re romantically interested. When you’re both relaxed and having fun, you could ask for her number and invite her on a date.

steps.title: If you’re flirting in person, maintain eye contact and smile.
steps.content: If you’re flirting in person, maintain eye contact and smile. Confidence is one of the biggest factors when it comes to flirting with a girl, and if you don’t look comfortable delivering your line, it’ll show. Make sure to look at the other person directly and flash a smile to make her feel at ease. If it helps, practice saying your joke in the mirror so you sound more natural and effortless! If you’re flirting with a girl on a dating app, Bilotta says you should “use a positive and respectful tone” and “be authentic and genuine.”
